name: Dangerous adventure
description:
Dangerous adventure is an adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. You have to take on the role of a traveler who was shipwrecked and ended up on an unnamed island. Arm yourself with a magical staff and hit the road in search of adventure! Explore mysterious locations, get out of the maze, fight monsters in a dark dungeon! Whether you can walk this path is up to you to decide!

Peculiarities:
- Beautiful graphics
- Interesting levels
- Nice soundtrack
